New Records: Anthony Edwards became the second player to have achieved 50 threes in the first nine games of the season, after Stephen Curry.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored a game-high 37 points, mostly on nine threes, and the Minnesota Timberwolves won with a 127-102 score over Portland Trail Blazers.
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Edwards addressed concerns about taking too many threes per game.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards expressed shock over defenders going under screens on him and quipped, 'F**k â€˜em.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The UNSTOPPABLE Edwards has been sinking 50 threes in the first nine games of the season.
Others: Anthony Edwards played for the US National Team in the 2023 FIBA Basketball World Cup and was selected to an All-FIBA World Cup Team.
